question: Which of the following part of Africa is called “Horn of Africa”?
option1: westernmost projection of the African continent.
option2: easternmost projection of the African continent.
option3: southernmost part of the African continent.
option4: North west part of African continent.
answer: easternmost projection of the African continent.
explanation: The Horn of Africa is a peninsula in Africa Continent. It lies along the southern side of the Red Sea and extends hundreds of kilometers into the Gulf of Aden, Somali Sea and Guardafui Channel. The area is the easternmost projection of the African continent.
